document_data.mainbody:
ingham, often called Weird Wingham, was an old half-orc of Damara in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Wingham was old, bald, and limping, with his stature bent by age, but with a sparkle in his bright eyes locking the stares of any young woman. He often spoke with a lyrical barkers voice, mastered in his decades with his traveling troupe.
Wingham was the uncle of the wizard Arrayan they had deep affection for one another.
He was the head of a traveling merchant band called Winghams Rascals, better known as Weird Winghams Wacky Weapon Wielders who traveled the Bloodstone Lands with their twenty colored wagons. Bards and jugglers accompanied the merchants to entertain with song and dance and artistry. The troupe traded exotic goods, weapons, and clothes from faraway lands and wondrous tales of distant heroes and mighty villains.
